services.name: First American Title Company
services.description: Full-service title and escrow company providing comprehensive real estate transaction services for buyers and sellers in the Rexburg area.

reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.comment: Excellent service throughout our home buying process. Very professional and responsive team.

reviews.author: Mike R.
reviews.comment: Smooth closing process, though communication could have been better during busy periods.

services.name: Mountain West Bank
services.description: Community bank offering home loans, personal banking, and financial services with local expertise and competitive rates.

reviews.author: Jennifer L.
reviews.comment: Great local bank with personal service. They made my first home loan process easy to understand.

services.name: Rexburg Property Management
services.description: Professional property management services for landlords and tenants, specializing in student housing and residential properties.

reviews.author: David K.
reviews.comment: Good property management company. Responsive to maintenance requests and fair with deposits.

reviews.author: Lisa T.
reviews.comment: Professional service, though rent prices have increased significantly in recent years.

services.name: Madison Memorial Hospital
services.description: Full-service hospital providing comprehensive healthcare services including emergency care, surgery, and specialty services.

reviews.author: Rachel P.
reviews.comment: Excellent emergency care when my son broke his arm. Staff was compassionate and professional.

services.name: Rocky Mountain Power
services.description: Electric utility company serving the Rexburg area with reliable power service and energy efficiency programs.
services.address: Service area coverage - no physical office in Rexburg

reviews.author: Tom H.
reviews.comment: Generally reliable service. Quick response to outages during winter storms.

services.name: All Seasons Moving & Storage
services.description: Professional moving company providing local and long-distance moving services for students and families relocating to Rexburg.

reviews.author: Amanda S.
reviews.comment: Great moving experience! They were careful with our furniture and very professional.

services.name: Quality Pest Control
services.description: Professional pest control services for residential and commercial properties, specializing in common Idaho pests.

reviews.author: Chris M.
reviews.comment: Effective treatment for our ant problem. Good customer service and reasonable pricing.

services.name: Rexburg Heating & Cooling
services.description: HVAC contractor providing installation, repair, and maintenance services for heating and cooling systems in Rexburg homes.

reviews.author: Mary J.
reviews.comment: Excellent service! They fixed our furnace quickly and explained everything clearly.

services.name: Walmart Supercenter
services.description: Large retail store offering groceries, household items, electronics, and services convenient for student and family needs.

reviews.author: Student K.
reviews.comment: Convenient one-stop shopping for everything I need as a student. Good prices too.

services.name: Snow College Physical Therapy
services.description: Physical therapy clinic providing rehabilitation services for injuries, sports medicine, and wellness programs.

reviews.author: Alex R.
reviews.comment: Great physical therapy after my knee surgery. The staff was knowledgeable and caring.

services.name: Rexburg Internet Services
services.description: Local internet service provider offering high-speed internet and cable services to residential and business customers.

reviews.author: Student L.
reviews.comment: Good internet speeds for online classes. Installation was quick and professional.

services.name: Madison Laundry
services.description: Full-service laundromat and dry cleaning facility providing convenient laundry solutions for students and residents.

reviews.author: Jessica W.
reviews.comment: Clean facilities and reasonable prices. The wash and fold service is convenient for busy students.

services.name: Rexburg Auto Repair
services.description: Full-service auto repair shop providing maintenance and repair services for all vehicle makes and models.

reviews.author: Matt D.
reviews.comment: Honest mechanics with fair prices. They fixed my car quickly and explained everything.

services.name: Porter's Craft & Frame
services.description: Local craft store offering art supplies, framing services, and creative materials for students and hobbyists.

reviews.author: Emily C.
reviews.comment: Great selection of craft supplies and helpful staff. Perfect for school projects.

services.name: Rexburg City Building Department
services.description: Municipal building department handling permits, inspections, and building code compliance for construction and renovation projects.

reviews.author: Bob T.
reviews.comment: Helpful staff for permit process. Wait times can be long during busy construction seasons.
